name: Waffle Shot
description:
This is a game made for the week 46 game jam. The theme was waffles and here is my game. If you wish to help me out I run a youtube channel called ObtainableVideos and CodingCorwyn I also have a patron.

CodingCorwyn- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX3FTvvvMi0eGx0wSKBiwbA?view_as=subscriber

ObtainableVideos- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQPkMzKDTeQh1IRhyNC_mMQ?view_as=subscriber

Patron - https://www.patreon.com/CorwynGentry
